scripts.getModel: ask api get-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.c81e5295-e948-4784-9182-d7397200ec00 -g development -l en-US>models/en-US.json -p adminuser
scripts.uploadModelUS: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.c81e5295-e948-4784-9182-d7397200ec00 --file models/en-US.json -l en-US --profile adminuser --stage development
